name: Bugger Off!
description:
Bugger Off! is an engaging tower defense strategy puzzle game set in a world where insects have been magnified to colossal proportions by the Dr. Thaddeus Hopperdoodle.

Players take the role of a rookie military frog trainer. Tasked with controlling and commanding a squadron of specially trained frogs, your mission is to thwart the relentless bug invasion. Players embark on a thrilling adventure across three diverse landscapes inspired by England, Egypt, and Japan, each with its own unique challenges.

Features:


  • Immersive tower defense that delivers its own unique twist to the genre
  • Various bugs and insects to fight against!
  • Different frogs with unique attacks and abilities!
  • Incrementally difficult waves and bosses
  • Upgradability of frogs
  • RNG jumping of frogs, creating unpredictability
  • Quirky, cartoony art style
  • It’s fun and free! Easy for you to try

Credits:


Made by Ribbit Inc.:
Áron Dexter: Product Owner/Designer & Implementation/Programmer
Essi Venho: Lead Art & Narrative
Khairulhelmy Hussain: Lead Tech (Programmer) & Publisher
Santiago Sala: Animation & Scrum Master/UI
Veikka Virtanen: Lead Designer & Q/A
Music: Jaakko Kuorikoski & Matti Mali
